connect.comment: Background color for the CONNECT method (purple.10).

delete.comment: Background color for the DELETE method (red.10).

get.comment: Background color for the GET method (blue.10).

head.comment: Background color for the HEAD method (gray.70).

options.comment: Background color for the OPTIONS method (gray.20).

patch.comment: Background color for the PATCH method (aqua.10).

post.comment: Background color for the POST method (green.10).

put.comment: Background color for the PUT method (yellow.10).

trace.comment: Background color for the TRACE method (pink.10).

_.comment: Text color for the CONNECT method (purple.60).

strong.comment: Strong text color for the CONNECT method (purple.70).

_.comment: Text color for the DELETE method (red.60).

strong.comment: Strong text color for the DELETE method (red.70).

_.comment: Text color for the GET method (blue.60).

strong.comment: Strong text color for the GET method (blue.70).

_.comment: Text color for the HEAD method (gray.20).

strong.comment: Strong text color for the HEAD method (gray.40).

_.comment: Text color for the OPTIONS method (gray.70).

strong.comment: Strong text color for the OPTIONS method (gray.80).

_.comment: Text color for the PATCH method (aqua.60).

strong.comment: Strong text color for the PATCH method (aqua.70).

_.comment: Text color for the POST method (green.60).

strong.comment: Strong text color for the POST method (green.70).

_.comment: Text color for the PUT method (yellow.60).

strong.comment: Strong text color for the PUT method (yellow.70).

_.comment: Text color for the TRACE method (pink.60).

strong.comment: Strong text color for the TRACE method (pink.70).
